name: Jahangir's Watch
description:
This is a level slice I built over the course of about 11 months in Unreal Engine 4, using a fully dynamic time of day and some simple movement mechanics. I wanted to make something users could experience in their own way instead of looking at videos or screenshots. Give it a go and let me know what you think!

WASD to move
SPACE to jump
Press R to RESET your position

Please bear in mind this project is very resource demanding, High or Epic quality will likely will only run at high framerates on 2070+ hardware.
